localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Sook empowers you to create a fully customised store, book by the hour and get detailed footfall analytics after your event. Simply drag & drop your digital content onto the walls of your virtual store and it comes to life as soon as your booking begins.
blogPost.body: Sook empowers you to create a fully customised store, book by the hour and get detailed footfall analytics after your event. Simply drag & drop your digital content onto the walls of your virtual store and it comes to life as soon as your booking begins.
blogPost.title: Sook Store Builder - Retail space as a service, by the hour, with video-walls!
blogPost.author: Sarel van Baalen

localize.description: Sook使您能够创建一个完全定制的商店，按小时预订，并在活动结束后获得详细的人流分析。只需简单地将您的数字内容拖放到虚拟商店的墙壁上，它就会在您的预订开始后立即变成现实。
localize.tagline: 零售空间作为一种服务，按小时计算，有视频墙!

localize.description: Sook使您能夠創建一個完全定製的商店，按小時預訂，並在活動結束後獲得詳細的人流分析。只需簡單地將您的數字內容拖放到虛擬商店的牆壁上，它就會在您的預訂開始後立即變成現實。
localize.tagline: 零售空間作爲一種服務，按小時計算，有視頻牆!

previous.excerpt: Kanda is building Affirm for general contractors. We let builders offer their customers a pay monthly option when they want a remodel but don't want to pay the full price upfront. Backed by YC (W21).
previous.title: Kanda - Affirm for general contractors

localize.description: 康达正在为总承包商打造Affirm。我们让建筑商为他们的客户提供一个按月支付的选项，当他们想要改造但又不想预付全款时。得到了YC（W21）的支持。
康達正在爲總承包商打造Affirm。我們讓建築商爲他們的客戶提供一個按月支付的選項，當他們想要改造但又不想預付全款時。得到了YC（W21）的支持。

next.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 54 days in a row, down 70% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/Vx4MqbWwAL

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已连续54天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/Vx4MqbWwAL。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已連續54天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了70%。🙏 https://t.co/Vx4MqbWwAL。
